languages.text: "Нет. Я не уйду только потому, что Ксавьер боится показать мне свое лицо". {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в шипение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Я не уйду только потому, что Ксавьер боится показать мне свое лицо". {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в шипение.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}

languages.text: “不，就算是希维尔懦弱得不敢露面，我也不打算离开。”{n}海因里希嘶声说出最后几个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不，就算是希维尔懦弱得不敢露面，我也不打算离开。”{n}海因里希嘶声说出最后几个字。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No. No voy a marcharme solo porque Xavier sea tan cobarde de no dejarse ver». {n}La voz de Heinrix pasa a ser un siseo al terminar la frase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No. No voy a marcharme solo porque Xavier sea tan cobarde de no dejarse ver». {n}La voz de Heinrix pasa a ser un siseo al terminar la frase.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「いいや。ザビエルが臆病すぎるあまりに顔を見せないからと言って、俺は立ち去らない」{n}ハインリックスの声は上ずったものとなっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいや。ザビエルが臆病すぎるあまりに顔を見せないからと言って、俺は立ち去らない」{n}ハインリックスの声は上ずったものとなっていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Non. Je refuse de faire demi-tour simplement parce que Xavier est trop lâche pour se montrer, » {n}siffle Heinrix entre ses dents.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non. Je refuse de faire demi-tour simplement parce que Xavier est trop lâche pour se montrer, » {n}siffle Heinrix entre ses dents.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Ich werde nicht gehen, nur weil Xavier zu feige ist, sich zu zeigen." {n}Mit seinen letzten Worten geht Heinrix' Stimme in ein Zischen über.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich werde nicht gehen, nur weil Xavier zu feige ist, sich zu zeigen." {n}Mit seinen letzten Worten geht Heinrix' Stimme in ein Zischen über.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır. Xavier, yüzünü gösteremeyecek korkağın teki diye gidecek değilim." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, son kelimelerde tıslamaya dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. I am not leaving just because Xavier is too cowardly to show his face." {n}Heinrix's voice becomes a hiss on the last words.{/n}
